title: We want to crowd author a book. What are some online platforms that we authors can use to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Go Simple. if you are crowd authoring a book and all of the authors involved are not in the final stage of publishing then use Google docs. Wattpad is an amazing site you could use for publicizing your story and getting feedback on the content; But google docs would be your best bet for convenience and editing purposes. It may seem like a mundane way to crowd author a book but it has the benefit of working offline, using being downloaded as a file for editing in word or your choice editor, and being really convenient for sharing documents that can be worked on by multiple people.
Archive of Our Own is a wonderful forum for an immensity of writing, although it is fanfiction-based so if that's not your forte then I suggest trying Wattpad - Stories You'll Love.
